project.name: Qarib
project.description: AI-Powered Media bilingual transcript management platform

achievements: Crafted and executed a solid eight-week MVP plan to meet tight deadlines.
Built a production-grade bilingual web application with full RTL/LTR support.

project.name: Bloowatch
project.description: Management solution and e-commerce system for watersports & outdoor centers

achievements: Engineering the complete, ground-up reimplementation of the B2B2C e-commerce system as a modular widget.
Increased frontend development speed by 45% by implementing a smooth migration plan from Ember to React.

project.name: FarmOS
project.description: Farm management and planning tool for growing indoors vertical farms

achievements: Led the design and implementation of an intuitive user interface for the Strawberry farm's management system.
Reduced E2E test time by 23% by integrating Playwright E2E testing.
Achieved on-time delivery by 95% by proactively addressing potential blockers before they impacted deadlines.

project.name: Player Profile
project.description: Engage & Reward Customers with Games for Marketing & Events

achievements: Facilitated the growth of team members to senior level by setting specific career goals, providing targeted training, and regularly tracking progress, resulting in a noticeable increase in skill proficiency.
Fostered a safe environment for the team by promoting open communication, respect, and collaboration.

project.name: Diwala Cred
project.description: Decentralized Web3 platform for issue, share, and verify digital credentials

achievements: Decreased process cycle time by 40% by reducing client issuance flow steps.
Cut support queries by 50% by automating student account creation during credential issuance.
Empowered clients with seamless, error-free data integration for scalable operations by building API integration that supports bulk issuance for thousands of credentials.
Modernized the tech stack and boosted dev speed by 30% by transitioning from PHP to React web apps.
Minimized technical debt and maintenance costs through the implementation of maintainable architecture and proactive management of application dependencies, resulting in enhanced system reliability.

project.name: Rich Messages Authoring Tool
project.description: Authoring rich messages web tool for Genesys users

achievements: Shortened rich messaging authoring time by 75% by building an intuitive forms and JSON editor.
Streamlined message creation by enabling 10x faster, error-free JSON message creation via intuitive forms.
Diminished technical debt by 27% by leading large-scale upgrades and refactoring for obsolete dependencies.
